Text: Re Financial Trading in Brazil Cc I have a conflict that day but would like to participate I will try to breakfree to call in Thanks Rick Sara CT AM To Lynn AvenENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Andrea BertoneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Rick HopkinsonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Bruce HarrisENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Gary CT cc Mark CT Randy YoungENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re Financial Trading in Brazil We have scheduled a meeting with Antonio Felix and Marcelo on Tuesday November at am Brazil time in Sao Paulo The purpose of the meeting will be to discuss the Tozzini memorandum of October address unanswered questions and identify issues for further research We are attempting to identify specific financial products for immediate trading For those of you in Houston who would like to participate please let me know and we can either revise the meeting time or conference you in later in the meeting Please confirm your attendance as soon as possible Thanks Sara Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM MBTOS Marcelo Rodrigues on AM To Sara CT cc Subject Re Financial Trading in Brazil So Paulo November Dear Sara Thank you for your message below November am at Enrons offices is OK Kind regards Marcelo Rodrigues Sara Shackleton pm AFAC and Marcelo Thank you for the message We would suggest Tuesday November at Enrons offices Is am convenient for you Please advise Regards Sara
